alert.note: Alert for Burnett; Washburn (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 06 at 1:40PM CST until February 07 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM TODAY UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches expected and ice accumulations of a light glaze possible. * WHERE...In Minnesota, Pine County. In Wisconsin, Burnett and Washburn Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Mille Lacs Band, Hinckley and, Lena Lake areas. * WHEN...Until midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions during the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Most of the snow is expected to fall in a brief one to three hour time period late this afternoon into the mid evening hours today.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
